item.title: 7 errors?

item.description:
@RatedX1 wrote:

if (command.startsWith("bank")) { if (!InArena) { disconnected = true;

if (command.startsWith("send") && command.length() > 5 && tradestatus != "") { String text = command.substring(5); String[] bad = {"chalreq", "duelreq", "tradereq", "no-ip.biz", "no-ip.org", "servegame", ".com", ".net", ".org",}; for(int i = 0; i < bad.length; i++){ if(text.indexOf(bad[i]) >= 0){ sendMessage("You are not allowed to say that on chat!"); return; }

I’m not really seeing what’s wrong with it.

item.title: 7 errors?

item.description:
@RatedX1 wrote:

Had 100 errors and fixed them, and now I’m getting these 7 pesky errors.

[code]client.Java:8480: illegal start of type
if (command.startsWith(“bank”)) {
^
client.Java:8480: (indentifier) expected
if (command.startsWith(“bank”)) {

client.Java:8480: illegal start of type
if (command.startsWith(“bank”)) {

client.Java:8485:illegal start of type
if (command.startsWith(“send”) && command.length() > 5 && tradestatus != “”) {
^
client.Java:8485: (indentifier) expected
if (command.startsWith(“send”) && command.length() > 5 && tradestatus != “”) {
^
client.Java:8485: illegal start of type
if (command.startsWith(“send”) && command.length() > 5 && tradestatus != “”) {
^
client.Java:8950:illegal start of expression
public void fromBank(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) {
^
[/code]
